title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1243.27 - Passenger wharfage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1243.27 - Passenger wharfage

State Regulations
(a) The
following charge will be made against all vessels (exclusive of excursion boats
or sight-seeing yachts), operating in foreign, coastwise or intercoastal
service, which embark or disembark passengers over the mooring facilities at a
terminal: (1)

For each passenger, not
exceeding 100............ $3
(2)

For each passenger, over 100............ $1
(b) Excursion boats and sight-seeing vessels
which embark or disembark passengers over the mooring facilities at a terminal: For each passenger............ 25
cents

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1243.27

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
